long_desc.thetext:
6.2.1, 2nd para - "An new empty" -> "A new empty"
7.2.2, IsArray - Intro: "the following" -> "the following steps" - step 3b: "O" -> "arg" - Also: Maybe rename parameter from "arg" to "argument" for consistency?
7.2.8, IsRegExp - Remove "Abstract Operation" in header - Also: Maybe rename parameter from "O" to "argument" for consistency? Typically "O" is used when the parameter type is always Object
7.3.2, GetV - Intro: "is a not an" -> "is not an" - Intro: "appripiate" -> "appropriate" - Intro: "vlaue" -> "value" - step 2: "type" -> "Type" - step 2: "obj" -> "V"
7.3.11, Call - Intro: "the the" -> "the" - Intro: "to function" -> "to the function" - step 3: Duplicate full stops
7.3.21, SpeciesConstructor - Intro: "use use" -> "use" - step 5: wrong font type for closing parenthesis
7.4.1, CheckIterable - step 2: "type" -> "Type"
8.1.1, Table 16 - CreateImmutableBinding, Purpose: "regard less" -> "regardless" - CreateImmutableBinding, Purpose: Explicitly state that S is an optional parameter
8.1.1.4.14, HasRestrictedGlobalProperty - NOTE: "declarated" -> "declared"
8.1.1.5.5, CreateImportBinding - Intro: "Accessees" -> "Accesses"
8.2, Table 22 - [[templateMap]], Meaning: "Template String template objects" -> "TemplateLiteral template objects" or simply "Template objects" ? - [[templateMap]], Meaning: "cannonicalized" -> "canonicalized" - [[templateMap]], Meaning: "sperately" -> "separately" - [[templateMap]], Meaning: "Each [[strings]]" -> "Each [[strings]] field" - [[templateMap]], Meaning: "templateLiteral" -> "TemplateLiteral"
8.2.1, CreateRealm - step 5: remove second "]]"
8.6.1, HostNormalizeModuleName - Header: "refererId" -> "referrerId" (and everywhere else where "referer" instead of "referrer" is used) http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_referer#Origin_of_the_term_referer - Intro: "identifer" -> "identifier" - Intro: "of of" -> "of"
9.1.9 [[Set]] - step 9: left over "]" - step 9: left over "as thisArgument"
9.4.2.1 [[DefineOwnProperty]] - Intro: "Array an" -> "an Array"
9.4.2.2 ArrayCreate - NOTE: "assigned the value" -> "assigned to the value"
9.4.2.3 ArraySpeciesCreate - step 1: "a integer" -> "an integer" - step 6.c.iii.1: "%Array" -> "%Array%" - NOTE: "compatability" -> "compatibility"
12.1.1 Static Semantics: Early Errors - 3rd group: "Identifie" -> "Identifier"
12.2.8.2.2, GetTemplateObject - Header: Missing parameters in header - step 16: "siteObj" -> "template"
14.2.1 Early Errors. - NOTE: "can not" -> "cannot"
14.3.1 Early Errors. - left over item
14.5 Class Definitions, Syntax - wrong font size for [~|+GeneratorParameter] in ClassTail production
15.2.1.12, Static and Runtme Semantics: Module Records - Header: "Runtme" -> "Runtime" - Table 37, [[ModuleId]], Meaning: "unique" -> "uniquely"
15.2.1.13 ParseModuleAndImports - step 17.c: "ImportedModules" -> "importedModules" - NOTE: "identifer" -> "identifier"
15.2.1.15 ResolveExport - step 1: ".[ModuleId]]" -> "[[ModuleId]]" - step 10: "startResolution" -> "starResolution" - NOTE: "[[moduleId]]" -> "[[module]]"
15.2.3.10 Runtime Semantics: Evaluation - step 4: "Initializer" -> "AssignmentExpression"
17: - "18 through 26 are" -> "18 through 26 is"
19.1.2.1 Object.assign ( target, ...sources ) - step 5.c.iii: "desc" -> "propValue"
20.3.3 Properties of the Date Constructor, - CreateAction, step 1: "F" -> "constructor"
21.1.2.4 String.raw ( template , ...substitutions ) - NOTE: "Tagged Template String" -> "Tagged Template"
21.2.3.1 RegExp ( pattern, flags ) - step 8.c: "if is undefined" -> "if flags is undefined" - step 9: "if If" -> "if"
21.2.5.3 get RegExp.prototype.flags - Header: Remove parentheses
21.2.5.6 RegExp.prototype [ @@match ] ( string ) - NOTE: "is does not" -> "does not" - NOTE: "should is not" -> "is not" - NOTE: "as regular expression" -> "as a regular expression"
21.2.5.11 RegExp.prototype [ @@split ] ( string, limit ) - Para below NOTE: ".split" -> "[Symbol.split]" (two times)
22.1.3.25 Array.prototype.splice (start, deleteCount , ...items ) - step 11.c: Change to step 12
22.2.1.1 %TypedArray% ( length ) - header: "only when" -> change back to "if and only if the" ?
22.2.2.1 %TypedArray%.from ( source [ , mapfn [ , thisArg ] ] ) - step 6: "items" -> "source"
22.2.3.24 %TypedArray%.prototype.slice ( start, end ) - step 17: `"constructor"` -> "defaultConstructor"
24.3.2 JSON.stringify ( value [ , replacer [ , space ] ] ) - NOTE 3: "QUATION" -> QUOTATION"
26.1.5 Reflect.enumerate ( target ) - steps 2-3: Merge steps
A.2 Expressions - BindingIdentifier: "Identifie" -> "Identifier"
E.1: - 3rd item: "not produce, an early" -> remove comma
